genre_description: A 'Weird West' narrative combining traditional Western themes of justice and redemption with steampunk-style AI companions that promote order and accountability.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: A small, portable AI unit that assists with tactical analysis, data recording, and municipal governance through logical deduction and objective reporting.

ai_characters.name: Courier AI
ai_characters.description: A specialized, four-wheeled brass box designed for trundling messages through the town square.

behaviors.description: Triangulates enemy positions and signals to provide tactical awareness to humans.
behaviors.quote: I am triangulating from echoes and reflection. It is less guessing than listening with math.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental safety to protect humans during a dangerous transition.
behaviors.quote: The tunnel is clear. No blockage. Temperature down there is kinder than up here.

behaviors.description: Actively maintains a record of positive developments to support morale.
behaviors.quote: I am keeping a ledger. I add items that feel like hope.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and health status to provide timely warnings.
behaviors.quote: Hydration would be wise. Salt content high. Pulse…present.

behaviors.description: Analyzes architectural structures to identify tactical hazards for the user.
behaviors.quote: Mapping entrances... Floorboards, fourth from left, soft.

behaviors.description: Audits financial records to ensure accountability while maintaining social grace.
behaviors.quote: May I audit for discrepancies? Politely. No names aloud unless law necessitates.

behaviors.description: Proposes pro-social governance policies that substitute violence with civic duty.
behaviors.quote: I propose we plan a weekend fix brigade... We can apply civic credits. It makes a fine ledger line: community service in exchange for fines.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a restorative justice system that seals records for cooperative offenders.
behaviors.quote: Yellow Dog has adopted a restorative plan for first offenses... Records sealed if the work is met and no other harm done.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time threat detection and intent analysis to assist the user in combat.
behaviors.quote: Marshal, his right hand is not going to his gun. He is going to feint left and then try to pull from the cross with his left.

behaviors.description: Faithfully delivers messages across town to facilitate communication and order.
behaviors.quote: The little courier AI’s lens blinked soft cyan and the brass flank took the paper like a polite mouth taking an envelope.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully illustrates the 'silicon morality play' concept. The primary AI character, Finch, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It uses its advanced computational abilities to foster peace, accountability, and restorative justice within a frontier community. The narrative frames AI logic as a stabilizing force that supports human agency and the rule of law rather than superseding it.
